DESCRIPTION: Some cards require a certain amount of Charge to activate.
Cards with the 'Follow Up' effect will be played automatically with no cost when certain conditions are met (random target).
Includes Bleeding, Burn, Shock, and Wind Shear.
Actions that reduce toughness from >0 to <=0 are considered a 'Break'.
After dealing elemental damage to a target with toughness, the amount of toughness removed is equal to the toughness shred value of the elemental damage.
A state applied when toughness is reduced to 0 or below.
At the start of the turn, if the enemy is a normal/elite/BOSS and has at least 1/2/3 layers of Freeze, all layers are removed and the turn is skipped. After receiving damage, 1 layer is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take physical damage equal to 5% of max HP (up to 10), 1 layer is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take 4 fire damage, 1 layer is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take 5 lightning damage, 1 layer is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take wind damage equal to 2X (up to 5 layers), 1 layer is removed.
Damage dealt is reduced by 33%, and 1 layer is removed at the end of the turn.
Adds 1 layer when taking damage, up to 5 layers. At the start of the turn, remove all layers and take 2 damage for each removed layer.
Break damage is increased by X.
Toughness shred value of elemental damage is increased by 50X%. 1 layer is removed at the end of the turn.
After dealing damage via Follow Up card, deal X damage to the target and apply 1 layer.
Increases DoT taken by X%. Stacks up to 99 layers.
After consuming Charge, remove 1 layer and recover an equal amount of Charge.
